}
name: Party vkey UnsafeParty

display_html:
data State
  • = Initial {
    • contestationPeriod :: ContestationPeriod
    • parties :: [Party]
    • headId :: CurrencySymbol
    • seed :: TxOutRef
    }
  • | Open {
    • contestationPeriod :: ContestationPeriod
    • parties :: [Party]
    • utxoHash :: Hash
    • headId :: CurrencySymbol
    }
  • | Closed {
    • parties :: [Party]
    • snapshotNumber :: SnapshotNumber
    • utxoHash :: Hash
    • contestationDeadline :: POSIXTime
    • contestationPeriod :: ContestationPeriod
    • headId :: CurrencySymbol
    • contesters :: [PubKeyHash]
    }
  • | Final
name: State $sel:contesters:Initial $sel:contestationDeadline:Initial $sel:snapshotNumber:Initial $sel:utxoHash:Initial $sel:parties:Initial $sel:contestationPeriod:Initial $sel:seed:Initial $sel:headId:Initial Open Final Closed Initial
